name: Alice: The Story of a Smuggling Mother
name_original: Alice: The Story of a Smuggling Mother
description:
Depart on an exciting smuggling mission with a hopeless mother.

Alice is a  young mother of two children, who has no money to provide for her family and is tired of feeling helpless until she encounters an irrefutable offer given by an old friend. This offer is to depart on a smuggling mission with Sanlúcar del Guadiana as the destination.

  • Based on true stories.
  • Beautiful art style.
  • Portuguese culture and history.
  • Interesting and relatable narrative.
  • Unique characters.
Controls:
  • Move: A and D, or left and right arrow keys.
  • Interact: Mouse left click.
Credits:
